## About

Via cnt is a free API that aims to help developers integrate the search for the National Tax Code (CNT) with their
services. You need to make a get request to (add the address) sending the National Economic Activity Code (CNAE) and the
api will return all the CNT corresponding to the informed CNAE.

<br />

### Tecnologies

- **PHP 8.1+**;
- **Laravel Framework 10.x+**;
- **Laravel Sail (Docker)**;
- **Oracle**;
  <br />

## Get Started

Please refer to [Development Setup](./.github/CONTRIBUTING.md#5-development-setup) section in our Contributing Guide.

All requirements and steps to run `Via Cnt` are listed there.

<br />

in [Contributing Guide](./.github/CONTRIBUTING.md).
